original_text: Please hide me in the place where dead people go! Hide me there until you are no longer angry. Decide how long I must be there, and then remember me again! Please hide me in the place where dead people go! Hide me there until you are no longer angry. Decide how long I must be there, and then remember me again! Please hide me in the place where dead people go!
korean_text: 주는 나를 스올에 감추시며 주의 진노를 돌이키실 때까지 나를 숨기시고 나를 위하여 규례를 정하시고 나를 기억하옵소서

sentences.original_text: in the place where dead people go
until you are no longer angry
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 더 이상 화가 나지 않을 때까지

sentences.original_text: Decide how long I must be there
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 얼마나 오래 거기에 있어야 하는지 결정해주세요

sentences.original_text: in the place where dead people go
until you are no longer angry
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 더 이상 화가 나지 않을 때까지
